course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Disruption of Traditional Finance (Fintech)
course.description: This course is focused on understanding how technology is shaping the business, changing the regulation, and disrupting traditional financial services and shaping population behaviour on emerging markets in China and South East Asia. How solely tech players are locking customers into their ecosystems and becoming an operating system of their lives. Upon the completion of the course, student would be able to understand how to prepare yourself in the rapid transformation of traditional environment in financial service and at the same time identify business opportunities. Graded P or F.
